hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select * from courses where obsolete = 'f' and (code like upper(:term) || '%' or plainto_tsquery(:term) @@ tsv) order by code asc

select a.* from assignments a, sections s, section_instructors i where a.assignment_type = 'ONLINE' and plainto_tsquery(:term) @@ a.tsv and a.section_id = s.id and s.id = i.section_id and i.instructor_id = :instructorId order by ts_rank(tsv, plainto_tsquery(:term), 16|32) desc

select f.* from users u, subscriptions s, forums f where u.id = :userId and u.id = s.subscriber_id and s.subscribable_type = 'FM' and s.subscribable_id = f.id and f.department_id is null and f.course_id is null order by f.name asc

select f.* from users u, subscriptions s, forums f where u.id = :userId and u.id = s.subscriber_id and s.subscribable_type = 'FM' and s.subscribable_id = f.id and f.department_id is not null order by f.name asc

select f.* from users u, subscriptions s, forums f where u.id = :userId and u.id = s.subscriber_id and s.subscribable_type = 'FM' and s.subscribable_id = f.id and f.course_id is not null order by f.name asc
select f.* from forums f, plainto_tsquery(:term) query where query @@ f.tsv order by ts_rank(tsv, query, 16|32) desc

select p.id, p.date, p.author_id, p.topic_id, p.edited_by, p.edit_date, ts_headline(p.subject, query) as subject, ts_headline(p.content, query, 'MaxWords=200') as content from forum_posts p, forum_topics t, plainto_tsquery(:term) query where p.topic_id = t.id and t.deleted = 'f' and query @@ tsv and t.forum_id = :forumId order by ts_rank(tsv, query, 16|32) desc

select id, path, ts_headline(ts_subject, query) as "subject", ts_headline(ts_content, query, 'MaxWords=200') as "content" from wiki_pages p, plainto_tsquery(:term) query where query @@ tsv order by ts_rank(tsv, query, 16|32) desc
